mapper.select: SELECT a.id as id, a.name as name, a.age as age, a.address as address, a.create_date as createDate, a.mobile as mobile, a.email as email, a.token as token, a.unique_id as uniqueid FROM order_user a where 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into order_user (unique_id, name, age, address, mobile, email, token, create_date) VALUES (#{uniqueid}, #{name}, #{age}, #{address}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{meiCangToken}, #{createDate})
insert into order_menu (id, name, corp_restaurant, revision_id, week_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{corpRestaurant}, #{revisionId}, #{weekDate})
mapper.update: update order_menu a set a.name = #{name}, a.corp_restaurant = #{corpRestaurant}, a.revision_id = #{revisionId} where a.id = #{id} AND a.week_date = #{weekDate}
mapper.delete: delete a FROM order_menu a where a.id = #{id} AND a.week_date = #{weekDate}
mapper.update: update order_config a set a.value = #{value}, a.date_create = #{dateCreate} where a.code = #{code}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id as id, a.code as code, a.value as value, a.date_create as dateCreate from order_config a
and code = #{code}
